attributes.action: Instruct First plus to reduce their Interest Rates in Line with current Market conditions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the consumer need the Prime Minister to think about the decent hard working people of Great Britain who are being forced cto paY THROUGH THE NOSE FOR MISTAKES AND TRYING TO SORT OUT THEIR FINANCES. No longer are we going to be bullied by the banks and depriving us of our human right to a decent standard of living

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
